column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at the Maxville Missionary Baptist Church located at Cave City with Bro. Boyce Johnson and Randy Smith officiating. Burial will follow in the Eutopia Cemetery located at Cave City with arrangements by Qualls Funeral Home of Cave City.  Visitation will be Monday
column5: 2015 from 6:00 until 8:00 p.m. at the church.
